definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
(math.) theory of functions of a real variable
(math.) theory of functions of a complex variable

sentences.english: But the continual offence is a very disputable concept in the theory of quantity of crime.
sentences.chinese: 而連續犯則是刑法罪數論中頗具爭議的概念。

sentences.english: Theory of Buddhism was similar to ancient India philosophy's Samkhya.
sentences.chinese: 佛教與古代印度數論哲學接近。

sentences.english: The Yoga system is considered by some to have arisen from the Samkhya philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽派被認爲是從某些數論派哲學中興起的。

sentences.english: Introduction to Algebra, Number Theory, Fermat's Last Theorem, etc.
sentences.chinese: 代數，數論，費爾馬大定理等介紹。

sentences.english: Algebra, Number Theory, Fermat's Last Theorem, etc.
sentences.chinese: 代數，數論，費爾馬大定理等介紹。

sentences.english: The original congruent number formula has been deduced by fundmental methods of number theory.
sentences.chinese: 通過運用初等數論方法，推導出本原同餘數公式。

sentences.english: The topic of primes is a large part of any book on number theory.
sentences.chinese: 在任意一本有關數論的書中，素數都是一個大的論題。

sentences.english: The solvability of an equation involving the arithmetical function is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究一個包含數論函數的方程的可解性。

definition: Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
